name: Puzzletrap
description:
A very simple and fun puzzle-based platformer game.

  • five different levels of increasing challenge
  • simple keyboard and mouse controls 
  • partial in-game controller support
  • gather gems and unlock the door
  • watch out for spikes
  • use platforms
  • use triggers


    NOTE: If this game gains a little bit of attention More Levels will be added to it including New Mechanics along with a Special Extra Mode.
